text: Daud Khan may refer to: * Mohammed Daoud Khan (1909–1978), President of the Republic of Afghanistan * Nawab Daud Khan, Nawab of Carnatic * Daud Khan Karrani (reigned 1572–76), Bengali ruler who fought the armies of Akbar the Great * David XI of Kartli (died 1579), aka Daud Khan of Kartli, Muslim Georgian king * Daud Khan Undiladze, 17th-century Georgian official in the Iranian service * Daud Khan (cricketer) (1912–1979), cricket player and umpire * Daud Ali Khan (died 1883), Nawab of Masulipatam in India
title: Daud Khan
